mapper.insert: INSERT INTO parent (parent_id, parent_name, parent_email, parent_pw, parent_phone, parent_relation, parent_city, parent_gu) VALUES (parent_seq.NEXTVAL, #{parentName}, #{parentEmail}, #{parentPw}, #{parentPhone}, #{parentRelation}, #{parentCity}, #{parentGu})
mapper.select: SELECT parent_id as "parentid", parent_name as "parentname", parent_email as "parentemail", parent_pw as "parentpw", parent_phone as "parentphone", parent_relation as "parentrelation", parent_city as "parentcity", parent_gu as "parentgu" FROM parent WHERE parent_email=#{parentEmail}
